wikipedia_page.main:
For other people named John Platt, see John Platt.

John Platt (born 1954) is a footballer who played as a goalkeeper in the Football League.

response: * John Platt (settler) (1632–1705), early settler of Norwalk, Connecticut
* John Platt (MP) (1817–1872), English manufacturer of textile machinery and Liberal politician
* John Platts (Unitarian) (1775–1837), English Unitarian minister and author, compiler of reference works
* John Platts-Mills (1906–2001), British Labour Party politician
